name: Mr Bomb Merged, BOOM! ( Legendary Bomber Ninja )
name_original: Mr Bomb Merged, BOOM! ( Legendary Bomber Ninja )
description:
“That which does not kill us, makes us stronger.” This is the famous words of German philosopher, Friedrich Nietzsche. Mr. Bomb believes it.

In the legendary life of Mr. Bomb, he experienced numerous explosions, but every time he survived. The explosions did not kill him, but made him stronger and stronger.

Here is what he says:

“Every explosion did destroy every bit of me, but it also made a new self”

“I really like the dangerous game, I hate to be ordinary”

“The colourful tiles are lovely, but they can also kill you”

“It’s amazing to be in the center of the explosion, just feel the shock flow through your body”

“Keep ahead, keep upgrading, keep abandoning old self. This is my life”


And here is what others says:

“I hope one day I can survive after an explosion, just like my older cousin” ——Bomberman

“When it comes to adventure, I won’t lost to anyone. Mr. Bomb? He is insane” —— Mario

Now, Let’s follow Mr. Bomb to make new legend!
